channel.title: Benefits on CloudNative Days
channel.description: Recent content in Benefits on CloudNative Days

item.title: Benefit 1
item.description: Here’s the first reason why this new product will benefit you. Words adding to the product description will help.

item.title: Benefit 2
item.description: Another benefit. Really tell people why they NEED to get this thing. Why is it better?

item.title: Sign Up Today
item.description: Provide a call-to-action (CTA) to Sign up with the MailChimp form. If you’re not using MailChimp, then this is Benefit 3.
